net.proteusframework.cms.component.editor

Interface EditorBuiltin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedNamedObject

    public interface EditorBuiltin
extends net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedNamedObject
    Represents an internal helper class that provides common UI functionality across multiple editors.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • commit

        void commit(EditorUI editorUI)
        Commit changes.
        Parameters:
        editorUI - the EditorUI. This should not be stored or referenced outside the scope of the method call.

      • getComponent

        net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.Component getComponent(EditorUI editorUI)
        Get the UI component.
        Parameters:
        editorUI - the EditorUI. This should not be stored or referenced outside the scope of the method call.
        Returns:
        the UI component for this builtin or null if a UI cannot be provided in the current context.

      • isPageElementDirty

        boolean isPageElementDirty(EditorUI editorUI)
        Return true if the PageElement is dirty.
        Parameters:
        editorUI - the editor UI. This should not be stored or referenced outside the scope of the method call.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • validate

        com.i2rd.cms.editor.ValidationState validate(EditorUI editorUI,
                                           net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notifiable errors)
        Validate the UI state in preparation for saving changes. This is always called after getComponent(EditorUI) and if isPageElementDirty(EditorUI) returns true.
        Parameters:
        editorUI - the EditorUI. This should not be stored or referenced outside the scope of the method call.
        errors - container to add errors for display in the UI.
        Returns:
        the state.
